entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is flying on a broomstick and competing in a duel with Malfoy. He is described as being able to fly easily and confidently.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is Harry's opponent in the duel. He is initially stunned but then tries to sneer at Harry.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a friend of Harry's who is watching the duel from the ground and admires Harry's flying skills.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is one of Malfoy's friends who is not present in the duel to help him.

relationships.description: Harry and Malfoy are competing against each other in a duel on broomsticks. Harry is described as being confident and skilled, while Malfoy looks worried.
